name: Brainsss
summary: Control multiple groups of zombies and guide them to victory with touch controls. Trap, chase, intimidate, and ultimately, convert those annoying humans. Build a massive swarm of zombies and trash the human defenses. Careful some of the humans will fight back! Unlock unique Hero zombies to power-up your zombie swarm with bonuses and special abilities. Play through more than 70 amazing, beautiful levels that include suburbia, hospitals, parks, airports, cities, and offices, to name a few. Use your cunning, strategy, and on the fly decision making to catch them all!
